scripts.build: node tools/genAppInfo.js `git rev-parse HEAD` && tsc -p tsconfig.json && webpack
scripts.build-dev: node tools/genAppInfo.js `git rev-parse HEAD` && tsc -p tsconfig.json && webpack --mode=development
scripts.build-migrate: tsc -p migrate/tsconfig.json && webpack --config migrate/webpack.config.migrateFrom.js && webpack --config migrate/webpack.config.migrateTo.js
